text: I noticed this issue this week still too.
We are working on a fix for the issue

Hello guys,

I just created a marketplace account to explore how I start selling stuff I created in the design tool

It created a new HS portal instead of merging with my existing HS portal

Is it a best practice to have two separated accounts or is it possible to merge them?

Thanks,

There are two types of accounts that support Marketplace submissions:
- A partner account (<https://www.HubSpot.com/partners>)
- A Marketplace provider account (<https://offers.HubSpot.com/free-marketplace-account>)

Some partners like to contain their listings in their partner account so that they can utilize workflows, emails, etc. Whereas some choose to keep things separate so that they can keep both accounts as clean as possible (in their design manager, etc.).

Thanks for your answe! My main account is a partner account, but it is a sales partner account (not an agency partner account) Maybe it is why it created a second account instead of just adding marketplace provider capabilities to the first one...
